**Ignition** is a level 8 [Fire Magic](/Fire_Magic "Fire Magic") spell which creates a 3x3 fireball (somewhat weaker than the [Fireball](/Fireball "Fireball") spell) around every enemy in sight. Explosions do not harm the user or their allies. All explosions are created instantly; even if an enemy would die from an explosion, it still creates an explosion.

## Strategy

While Ignition deal less single-target damage than even [Fireball](/Fireball "Fireball"), it hits every enemy on the screen, and the explosions can overlap. This makes it a great spell against groups (that are not resistant to fire).

- Great in naturally packed areas, like [Vaults](/Vaults "Vaults"):5, [the Tomb](/The_Tomb "The Tomb"), or later floors of a [Ziggurat](/Ziggurat "Ziggurat").
- Since Ignition works against [summoned](/Summon "Summon") creatures, it is good against summoners like [mummy priests](/Mummy_priest "Mummy priest").
- Works great on [the Royal Jelly](/The_Royal_Jelly "The Royal Jelly"). Once a few jellies have spilled out, just 2-3 casts are enough to kill TRJ and most of its allies. Just watch out for [rockslimes](/Rockslime "Rockslime") afterwards.

### Tips & Tricks

- As the description suggests, allies will never be harmed by this spell, making it particularly desirable for characters banned from harming companions, such as followers of [Beogh](/Beogh "Beogh") or [Jiyva](/Jiyva "Jiyva"). Players making use of [Summonings](/Summonings "Summonings") or [Necromancy](/Necromancy "Necromancy") spells can also benefit.

## History

- Ignition was added in version [0.20](/0.20 "0.20").
